sections.title: Interim Financial Reporting
sections.description: Checklist for presentation and disclosure requirements under IAS 34.

items.question: If an estimate of an amount reported in a previous interim period is changed significantly during the final interim period of the financial year, but a separate financial report is not published for that final interim period, has the nature of that change in estimate been disclosed in a note to the annual financial statements for that financial year?

If an estimate of an amount reported in a previous interim period is changed significantly during the final interim period of the financial year, but a separate financial report is not published for that final interim period, has the amount of that change in estimate been disclosed in a note to the annual financial statements for that financial year?
